data.name: XGAMER - AI Revolution | World Simulation Lab
data.detailed_description:
Create your own world in a stable timeline! You can create countless parallel worlds in this timeline, one, or tens of thousands of worlds, all by yourself! Everyone has their own ideas, and we are also looking forward to what your world will be like!

XGamer - AI Revolution | World Simulation Lab contains:

- Complete snow mountain scene
- beautiful twilight time
- Unlimited buildings or NPCs can be added
- Easy road
- Delicate lake horizon
- and more!

Travelers! Time to create your own world! We look forward to your work!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7th
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 980
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7th
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
